tool_description: Find yarn colorways by HTML hex color code.
name: Yarn Colorways
title: Yarn Colorways

api_list.name: Yarns
api_list.description: Get all yarn IDs and names, useful to filter /match or /colorway results.

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: The brand ID or name, or a comma-sepparated list of brand IDs or brand names to filter the results by.

api_list.name: Find Yarn by Color
api_list.description: Get best-matching yarn colorways for a specified color.

required_parameters.name: color
required_parameters.description: Any string that can be correctly parsed as a color by [chroma.js](https://gka.github.io/chroma.js/).

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Specify the starting index of the data to return. Default is 0.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of yarn colorways to include in the results. Default is 50. Maximum is 500.

optional_parameters.name: threshold
optional_parameters.description: The minimum percentage amount the yarn colorway must match the supplied color. Default is 75.

optional_parameters.name: yarn
optional_parameters.description: The yarn Id or yarn Name to filter the results by. Text case is ignored.

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: The brand Id or brand Name to filter the results by. Text case is ignored.

api_list.name: Brands
api_list.description: Get all brand IDs and names, useful to filter /match or /colorway results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yarn-colorways.p.rapidapi.com/v1/brands"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yarn-colorways.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yarn-colorways.p.rapidapi.com/v1/brands"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yarn-colorways.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Colorways

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The Name of the yarn colorway to filter the results by. Text case is ignored.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: Default is `default`. Accepted values are `name`, `lightness`, and `default`.

optional_parameters.name: direction
optional_parameters.description: Default is `ASC` (ascending). Accepted values are `ASC` and `DESC` (descending).

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of yarn colorways to include in the results. Default is 50. Maximum is 500.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Specify the starting index of the data to return. Default is 0.

optional_parameters.name: yarn
optional_parameters.description: The yarn Name or Id to filter the results by. Text case is ignored.

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: The brand Name or Id to filter the results by. Text case is ignored.

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description: Any string that can be correctly parsed as a color by [chroma.js](https://gka.github.io/chroma.js/)
